get.desc: Lists all of the Front Doors within a resource group under a subscription.

default.desc: Front Door error response describing why the operation failed.

get.desc: Gets a Front Door with the specified Front Door name under the specified subscription and resource group.

default.desc: Front Door error response describing why the operation failed.

put.desc: Creates a new Front Door with a Front Door name under the specified subscription and resource group.

params.desc: Front Door properties needed to create a new Front Door.
params.name: frontDoorParameters

201.desc: Created. The request has been fulfilled and a new Front Door has been created.

202.desc: Accepted. The request has been accepted for processing and the operation will complete asynchronously.

default.desc: Front Door error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.desc: Deletes an existing Front Door with the specified parameters.

202.desc: Accepted. The request has been accepted for processing and the operation will complete asynchronously.

204.desc: No Content. The request has been accepted but the Front Door was not found.

default.desc: Front Door error response describing why the operation failed.

post.desc: Removes a content from Front Door.

params.name: contentFilePaths
params.desc: The path to the content to be purged. Path can be a full URL, e.g. '/pictures/city.png' which removes a single file, or a directory with a wildcard, e.g. '/pictures/*' which removes all folders and files in the directory.

202.desc: Accepted and the operation will complete asynchronously.

default.desc: Front Door error response describing why the operation failed.
